title: Rhythms of the Road
inclusions_evidence: Transport by coach with free Wi-Fi
Tickets to a musical performance at the Grand Ole Opry
Visit to Gateway Arch National Park
Admission to Graceland, including audio tour and access to private jets
Admission to B.B. King Museum and Delta Interpretive Center

other.notes: Additional costs for attractions and meals not included in the package.

reasoning: The deal offers a comprehensive tour experience with multiple inclusions, but lacks flight arrangements and specific DIY pricing for accommodations.
additional_notes: DIY costs for hotels and flights were not reliably obtainable.
